= Update Commands =

To eliminate most of the question in IRC and to start a good documentation process (also to push Zero_Chaos to put a livecd out), I've written a Wiki for updating Pentoo

Follow these steps from a fresh install to bring your system up to date.

== For the first time ==

{{{
echo 'ACCEPT_LICENSE="Oracle-BCLA-JavaSE AdobeFlash-10.3"' >> /etc/make.conf

echo "`*`"  > /etc/eix-sync.conf

#Sync with the gentoo portage tree
emerge --sync 
# Updates portage
emerge -1 portage 

# Sync overlays and re-add pentoo (a temp workaround)
layman -S && layman -d pentoo && layman -a pentoo 

# Update /etc/portage{keywords|mask}, choose -5 to auto update
emerge -1 pentoo-etc-portage && etc-update 

# Temporary workarounds
emerge -C talloc && emerge -1 talloc
emerge -f dev-java/sun-jdk dev-java/sun-jre-bin 
emerge -1 sys-apps/sysvinit sys-apps/util-linux

# Download everything we need first to ensure it works.
emerge --deep --update --newuse world -vatf

# Check live packages for updates and emerge them as necessary.
smart-live-rebuild

revdep-rebuild
}}}

== On regular basis ==

{{{
eix-sync
emerge -DNu world
smart-live-rebuild
etc-update
emerge --depclean
revdep-rebuild
eclean-dist -d
}}}


Any questions, comments, errors... just ask.
